definition: of or relating to precious stones or the art of working with them, a skilled worker who cuts and engraves precious stones
details:
adjective
- of or relating to precious stones or the art of working with them
= example: of or relating to precious stones or the art of working with them
noun
- a skilled worker who cuts and engraves precious stones
= synonyms: lapidist
- an expert on precious stones and the art of cutting and engraving them
= synonyms: lapidarist
